com.fxgraph.graph

Class SequenceDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxgraph.graph.Graph
      • com.fxgraph.graph.SequenceDiagram

  • public class SequenceDiagram
extends Graph
    A specialized graph that represents a sequence diagram.
    Author:
    sirolf2009, ogallagher (javadoc)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SequenceDiagram.ActorCell
      A specialized cell representing an actor in a sequence diagram.
      static interface  SequenceDiagram.IActorCell
      Interface that any sequence diagram actor cell must implement.
      static interface  SequenceDiagram.IMessageEdge
      An edge representing a sequence diagram message between actors.
